chunk:
Atopalm Kids Face Lotion

Brand: ATOPALM

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER/AQUA, GLYCERIN, CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE, PROPANEDIOL, MYRISTOYL/PALMITOYL OXOSTEARAMIDE/ARACHAMIDE MEA, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, SORBITAN STEARATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, GLYCERYL STEARATE, STEARIC ACID, HELIANTHUS ANNUUS (SUNFLOWER) SEED OIL, OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE)

EA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) FRUIT OIL, HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL, POLYGLYCERYL-10 DISTEARATE, COCOS NUCIFERA (COCONUT) OIL, VANILLA PLANIFOLIA FRUIT EXTRACT, EUPHORBIA CERIFERA (CANDELILLA) WAX, SACCHARIDE ISOMERATE, VISCUM ALBUM (MISTLETOE) FRUIT EXTRACT, BETA-GLUCAN, TRITICUM VULGARE (WHEAT) SPROUT EXTRACT, BRASSICA OLERACEA ITALICA (BROCCOLI) SPROUT EX

(BROCCOLI) SPROUT EXTRACT, PANTHENOL, TOCOPHEROL, PHYTOSTEROLS, ARGININE, CARBOMER, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM PHYTATE, PELARGONIUM GRAVEOLENS FLOWER OIL, LAVANDULA HYBRIDA OIL, PINUS SYLVESTRIS LEAF OIL, CAPRYLYL GLYCOL

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
